name: workerbee-multi-user
description: 複数人対応タスク管理アプリ

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp -r public/* dist/ && touch dist/.nojekyll
scripts.build:windows: if not exist dist mkdir dist && xcopy /E /I public\* dist\ && echo. > dist\.nojekyll
scripts.deploy: npm run build && echo 'Build completed for GitHub Pages'
scripts.deploy:netlify: npm run build:netlify && echo 'Build completed for Netlify'

author: WorkerBee Team
